data.name: Hop Skip and Thump
data.detailed_description:
You play this turn-based, puzzle-like strategy game as a rabbit named "Hop". Your opponent is "Skip". The object of the game is to jump around on the game board, score points, and beat Skip.



Also on the board are playful creatures called “Thump". Some move about randomly while others actively try to block your moves.
Beware the red Thump. If they touch you, you are thumped and lose a turn.




To play well, you must account for Skip and the Thump sprites so that you avoid being blocked or forced into bad moves. And do not pass up the opportunity to earn the 10 bonus points when you meet a color objective.



Whimsical Strategy-Puzzle game. Fun for any age.

FEATURES
  • Single player
  • 100 levels of play
  • Good for long and short play-sessions alike
  • Family-Friendly
  • Deceptively tricky
  • No data are collected and stored outside of your device.
  • No ads. No microtransactions.
data.about_the_game:
You play this turn-based, puzzle-like strategy game as a rabbit named "Hop". Your opponent is "Skip". The object of the game is to jump around on the game board, score points, and beat Skip.



Also on the board are playful creatures called “Thump". Some move about randomly while others actively try to block your moves.
Beware the red Thump. If they touch you, you are thumped and lose a turn.




To play well, you must account for Skip and the Thump sprites so that you avoid being blocked or forced into bad moves. And do not pass up the opportunity to earn the 10 bonus points when you meet a color objective.



Whimsical Strategy-Puzzle game. Fun for any age.

FEATURES

  • 100 levels of play
  • Good for long and short play-sessions alike

data.short_description: Thump monsters turn what at first appears to be a simple strategy game into something more challenging. Play as Hop. Jump around and outscore Skip to win. Dodge Thump monsters chasing you and blocking your moves. Outsmart Skip on an ever-changing board. Charming, but deceptively tricky.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX 10, DX 11, DX 12 capable
  • Storage: 120 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS HighSierra 10.13+
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 142 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS Big Sur
  • Processor: Apple M1 chip with 8‑core CPU, 7‑core GPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 7‑core GPU
  • Storage: 142 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
